name: Free magnetic & digital compass
description: Use digital & magnetic compass free app for android indoor/outdoor activities.  It is a full functional magnetic compass free application for android without unnecessary permissions.This is a high precision digital & magnetic compass free app.  digital & magnetic compass free app for android features:  Show Magnetic North  Show Magnetic strength  Full-screen map  Sensor status  Direction  Compass free offline  Latitude, longitude and address  True heading and magnetic heading  Slope level meter  Note  Do not use the compass app with magnetic covers.
